item.description:
Hello dance lovers!  Here's your chance to sign up for a group dance lesson and progressively learn week to week for 6 weeks. We will focus on two dances- currently open to requests.  No partner required.

Because this is a class upon which we build from the previous week, we request that participants pay for all 6 weeks at the first lesson to guarantee payment to the instructor.  Cost is $10 per class, $60 total for 6 weeks.  If you miss a lesson, you will not be refunded your money.

Please be respectful of your meetup peers because if you miss a lesson you will be wasting their time the following week while you are trying to catch up.

CLASS DATES: 2/18, 2/25, 3/4, 3/11, 3/18, 3/25, 4/1.  We will not meet 3/18.
item.why: As requested from previous attendees, we are planning a 6 week dance class.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Ballroom Dance- 6 week program
